name: Topics in Biomedical Engineering
descrp: An introductiom to the heat and mass transport processes of importance to biomedical engineering. The course will focus on mathematical modeling, medical devices, and applications of heat and mass transfer processes of importance to the biomedical field. The course will focus on three ranges of temperature: a) physiological and above physiological, b) below physiological to the freezing temperature of water, and c) below the freezing temperature of water.
